item.title: "我以为我要死了"一名妇女在被一只母熊带着幼崽撕咬后被送进了医院，她讲述了这起肆无忌惮的动物袭击事件。
item.description:
"I thought I was going to die." A woman who was hospitalized after being mauled by a mother bear with her cubs is recounting the brazen animal attack. https://t.co/Q8ggtkwgcP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 印第安纳州一位母亲的家人和朋友说，他们对这位母亲上周从多米尼加共和国乘坐航班度假归来时突然死亡感到震惊。
item.description:
Family and friends of an Indiana mother said they were stunned by her sudden death as she returned from vacation last week aboard a flight from the Dominican Republic. https://t.co/U66lCJrq2n

item.title: 研究显示，四名先天性艾滋病病毒感染儿童在暂停接受艾滋病药物治疗后，一年多的时间里都没有感染病毒。
item.description:
Four children born with HIV were able to live virus-free for more than a year after their HIV medication was paused, study shows. https://t.co/4VV8vWdP4l

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 华尔街日报》记者埃文-格什科维奇（Evan Gershkovich）的父母将作为议长迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）的嘉宾出席国情咨文。
item.description:

item.title: 美国联邦卫生官员周三表示，美国一些折扣零售商出售的肉桂碎含有大量铅，应予以丢弃。
item.description:
Ground cinnamon sold by some U.S. discount retailers is contaminated with high levels of lead and should be discarded, federal health officials said Wednesday. https://t.co/Xh7tcIpuAq

item.title: 据阿拉斯加雪橇犬比赛官员称，一只 "愤怒的驼鹿 "缠住了他的雪橇犬队，一名五届艾迪塔罗德雪橇犬赛冠军被迫开枪射杀了这只 "愤怒的驼鹿"。
item.description:
A five-time Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race champion was forced to fatally shoot what he described as an "angry moose" after the animal became entangled with his team of dogs, according to officials of the Alaska competition. https://t.co/qZCZxjyxFg pic.twitter.com/Yl9GNGGmfP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 伊丽莎白-楚尔科夫（Elizabeth Tsurkov）是普林斯顿大学政治学系的一名学生。将近一年前，当她在巴格达为论文进行实地考察时，在离开一家咖啡馆时遭到绑架。更多信息
item.description:
Elizabeth Tsurkov is a Princeton political science student. Nearly one year ago, when she was doing field studies in Baghdad for her dissertation, she was kidnapped while leaving a café.

Read more: https://t.co/x9cabFFWhH pic.twitter.com/rEpDrSRuOh

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: "锈迹斑斑》的装甲师汉娜-古铁雷斯（Hannah Gutierrez）在摄影师哈丽娜-哈钦斯（Halyna Hutchins）拍摄现场被枪杀一案中被认定犯有过失杀人罪，她将面临 18 个月的监禁。陪审员认定她在此案中篡改证据的罪名不成立。
item.description:
"Rust" armorer Hannah Gutierrez has been found guilty of involuntary manslaughter in the fatal on-set shooting of cinematographer Halyna Hutchins. She faces up to 18 months in prison.

Jurors found her not guilty of tampering with evidence in the case. https://t.co/sSwx3Rmzzp pic.twitter.com/EBh0WScbf8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 本周四晚，拜登总统将走上演讲台，发表他的第三次国情咨文演讲，这对他来说是一个关键时刻--但他的政治前途可能并不取决于周四的演讲。
item.description:
On Thursday night, Pres. Biden will take the speaker’s dais and deliver his third State of the Union address at a pivotal moment for him — but his political future probably does not depend on Thursday’s speech. https://t.co/QRO7OS0xfc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024

item.title: 根据最新公布的起诉书，中国公民在加利福尼亚州被捕，并被指控涉嫌窃取谷歌人工智能项目的商业机密，同时秘密为两家位于中国的人工智能初创公司工作。
item.description:
Chinese national arrested in California and charged with allegedly stealing confidential trade secrets from Google's Artificial Intelligence program while secretly working for two AI startup companies based in China, according to newly unsealed indictment. https://t.co/R9tz8abvOE

item.title: 拜登总统的连任竞选团队将于本周四在全美 50 个州举办 200 多场国情咨文观看派对，为 11 月与前总统特朗普的复选做准备。

item.title: 特朗普的律师说，曼哈顿检察官正在对唐纳德-特朗普进行 "痴心妄想"，将封口费与试图影响 2016 年大选联系起来。

item.title: 周三，教皇方济各再次要求助手宣读他的讲话，但由于呼吸系统和行动不便，他无法回到自己的教皇车上。
item.description:
Pope Francis again asked an aide to read his remarks and was unable to get back onto his popemobile Wednesday as lingering respiratory and mobility problems continued to take their toll on the 87-year-old pontiff. https://t.co/OPWeV2ENqH pic.twitter.com/NZC2CRg0Xw

item.title: 过去的选举周期表明，仅根据特朗普迄今为止在初选中的表现来推断他将在 11 月落败，可能并不完全是一种苹果与苹果之间的比较。
item.description:

item.title: 检察官告诉陪审员，《锈迹斑斑》的装甲师汉娜-古铁雷斯（Hannah Gutierrez）的疏忽导致了摄影师哈丽娜-哈钦斯（Halyna Hutchins）的死亡，而辩方则在古铁雷斯非故意过失杀人案的结案陈词中反驳说，古铁雷斯是一只 "替罪羊"。
item.description:
Prosecutors told jurors that "Rust" armorer Hannah Gutierrez's negligence led to the death of cinematographer Halyna Hutchins, while the defense countered that Gutierrez is a "scapegoat" during closing arguments in her involuntary manslaughter trial. https://t.co/35pdOodjCN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 6, 2024
